column2: "Ɔwo edan ɔdasanyi kɔ ɔsɛɛ mu; Na ese dɛ
"Na mfe apem yɛ w'enyi do Dɛ ndeda a oetwa mu
"Ɔwo ema nyimpa pem kɔ dɛ nsuyirii; wɔyɛ dɛ adaaso: Anapa wɔtse dɛ nkyɛkyɛr a ɔfefɛw."

column3: na ɔfefɛw; Ewimbir no wotwa kyen

column6: Edze hɛn nsumaa mu bɔn aba w'enyim kan no mu."

column2: "Na hɛn nda nyinara etwa mu kɔ wɔ w'ebufuw mu: Hɛn mfe ba ewiei dɛ ahomgu."
"Hɛn mfe mu nda yɛ mfe eduosuon
column3: Anaa bi a ahoɔdzen ntsi wodu mfe eduowɔtwe; Naaso hɔn ahopɔw yɛ ɔberɛ na awerɛhow; Na otwa mu ntsɛmara
Na w'ebufuhyew dɛ mbrɛ wo ho suro tse?"

column2: "Ntsi kyerɛkyerɛ hɛn ma yɛnkan hɛn nda

column4: san w'ekyir fi w'ebufuw ho: ɔnkyɛr nkodu dabɛn ara? Ao
column5: ma wo nkowaa adze nyɛ wo mbɔbɔr."

column2: "Fa wo mbɔbɔrhu mee hɛn anapahema; Ma yendzi ehurusi na hɛn enyi ngye hɛn nda nyinara."
"Ma hɛn ho nsɛpɛw hɛn dɛ mbrɛ nda a ahaw hɛn wɔ mu no tse
column3: Na dɛ mbrɛ mfe a yeehu mu mbusu no tse."

column2: "Ma w'edwuma nda edzi mma wo nkowaa
column3: Na w'enyimnyam nda edzi wɔ hɔn mba do."

column2: "Na ma EWURADZE hɛn Nyankopɔn n'enyimtsewee no mbra hɛn do: Na ma hɛn nsaano edwuma nyɛ yie mma hɛn; Nyew
column3: ma hɛn nsaano edwuma nyɛ yie."
